[This.GetTitledFirstName] no longer desires to owe fealty to any man.  We shall stand on our own!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] demands the prestige of a higher title!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] will be known as a proper monarch!
See Our House on the Byzantine Throne

It is not enough for the [This.GetOnlyDynastyName] Dynasty to rule only these lands.  It must spread and flourish - and there are few seats more esteemed than that of the Byzantine Emperor.  [This.GetTitledFirstName] will see to it that a member of [This.GetHerHis] house occupies that throne.
See Our House on the Imperial Throne

It is not enough for the [This.GetOnlyDynastyName] Dynasty to rule only these lands.  It must spread and flourish - and there are few seats more esteemed than that of the Holy Roman Emperor.  [This.GetTitledFirstName] will see to it that a member of [This.GetHerHis] house occupies that throne.
See Our Dynasty in the Holy See

Quite apart from any religious concerns, none could deny that the Pope occupies a position of great political significance.  Even if [This.GetTitledFirstName] cannot occupy it [This.GetHerHim]self, it still might be possible to see a loyal member of [This.GetHerHis] dynasty installed in that position...

My children are ready to be provided with positions of real power, as surely they deserve.  If I can ensure that each of them has a county of their own, or at least is married to a ruler of significance, it would both provide them with practice at rulership and hopefully ameliorate any petty squabbles when I should pass.

Marriage is primarily a strategic affair, of course.  But all the same, [This.GetTitledFirstName] holds out hope that [This.GetSheHe] might achieve with [This.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] the kind of love and romance about which bards sing such foolish, dreamy songs.

At times, a ring is more effective a weapon than a thousand men-at-arms.  [This.GetTitledFirstName] wishes to bring two kingdoms together in a marriage, to produce a single, blessed heir.  Of [This.GetHerHis] dynasty, of course.

column2: Plot to take revenge against [This.GetTitledFirstName] for [This.GetHerHis] treacherous acts. Revenge is a dish best served cold, after all..
The Guelphs are aiming at restoring Papal investiture in the Holy Roman Emperor, even with the means of scheming and fighting for a new accondescending ruler if need be.
The Guelphs are aiming at restoring free investiture in the Holy Roman Emperor, even with the means of scheming and fighting for a new accondescending ruler if need be.
This faction is composed of vassals that are loyal to their liege, and that will (or should) support their ruler in any internal war.
